com.linkedin.cubert.operator.aggregate

Interface AggregationFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAggregationFunction, ArrayListAggregation, BitwiseORAggregation, CountAggregation, CountDistinctAggregation, CreateArray, MaxAggregation, MinAggregation, SumAggregation

    public interface AggregationFunction
    Specifies a function to aggregate a column. This function is used in conjunction with the GROUP_BY operator as well as in the Combiner operation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
